programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Refusing to let Corazon go to Tiago's house alone, Marcial accompanies her to Santi's birthday party. The trip proves fruitful for Marcial as he discovers an undisclosed information about his nemesis. Meanwhile, Rhian finds out Tiago's cruel plan against the people of Sto. Francisco.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Fearing for their respective daughters' lives, Romina and Daniela both find it hard to keep calm. Robert takes matters into his own hands and carefully makes use of his resources to satisfy the kidnappers' demands. Kulas, on the other hand, disregards the possible consequences of his actions and takes one step ahead. Meanwhile, Marga attempts to get past her abductors in desperation to escape. However, this only puts her and Cassie in even more danger.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Kulas' careless act pisses off the kidnappers and drives them to demand more money from the Mondragons. With double the amount to gather and less time to deliver, Robert struggles to keep his composure. Cassie, on the other hand, remains brave in the face of danger. Using her wits, she creates an opportunity to outsmart and escape her abductors. However, instead of finding a way out, she receives a revelation that shakes her to the core.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Gabriel asks Rigor about his mother, but doubts his father’s honesty. Later, Carlos invites him for a drink. Isabel is hopeful about rekindling her friendship with Carlos, but faces constant disagreement with her mother. Meanwhile, Roman discovers that Maila is investigating Rigor as well.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Carlos comforts Isabel, unknowingly giving her false hope of a reconciliation. Her joy fades when she hears Sandra arguing with Josh. Later, Carlos meets Gabriel for a drink and informs him about Rigor’s attempts to contact Victoria. Meanwhile, Maila gets a call from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Maybe This Time
programme.desc: Years after a bitter separation, two long-lost sweethearts reunite and confront the pains of the past to give love a second chance.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.

programme.title: Starting Over Again
programme.desc: When Ginny reunites with her ex-boyfriend after receiving an email he wrote and sent four years ago, she takes this as a sign to get back together with him despite the pains of the past.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris and Ali receive a warm welcome from Basti in Greece. However, Basti and Ali's close friendship rubs Iris the wrong way. Meanwhile, Val hesitates to tell Cassandra and Agnes that she is marrying the person they have loathed for years.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Thinking that Basti is a bad influence on Ali, Iris urges her best friend to stay away from him. Meanwhile, Cassandra and Agnes notice that Valerie is being distant with them.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian tries her best to save the people of Barrio Sto. Francisco from Franco's men. She then leaves the small town with Isabelle and Elai. Meanwhile, Marcial urges Corazon to stay away from Tiago. Tiago, on the other hand, is enraged upon learning that someone helped the people of Barrio Sto. Francisco escape.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian is haunted by the tragic events that transpired in Barrio Sto. Francisco and confronts Franco for leading the attack on the small town. However, Tiago defends Franco and reveals his reason for asking him to do it. Meanwhile, Marcial and his team learn that Rhian was in Barrio Sto. Francisco before the attack.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Unable to do anything to help save their respective daughters, Romina and Daniela can only pray. Robert refuses to adhere to the kidnappers’ demands. As he heads out to deliver the ransom money in exchange for Cassie and Marga, he discreetly conspires with his allies to plot against the criminals. However, Alvin's sudden appearance jeopardizes the success of his plans. Will the Mondragon patriarch be able to bring Cassie and Marga back to safety and come back alive?

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After seeing Cassie confront Robert for the truth, Romina is left with no choice but to recount her bitter past. This deeply upsets Marga, who is being plagued by guilt after accidentally spilling the truth to Cassie. Daniela, on the other hand, begins to suspect Alvin for orchestrating the abduction. Meanwhile, Hector and Alvin continue their plan to exact revenge on Robert. Carlos also questions Daniela over the unexplained withdrawals from their bank account.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Following an appalling incident with her drunkard uncle, Dodong, Aryann elopes with her boyfriend Waldo, who her family disapproves of. However, when Dodong tries to stop her, Waldo steps in and accidently kills him.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Desperate to get Waldo out of prison, Aryann is forced to works as a call girl to fund his case. She soon meets Tristan, a rich businessman who offers to help her out of her predicament.

programme.title: Starting Over Again
programme.desc: When Ginny reunites with her ex-boyfriend after receiving an email he wrote and sent four years ago, she takes this as a sign to get back together with him despite the pains of the past.
